mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(TRACK_ID)+1 FROM CASE_TRACK
insert into CASE_TRACK (TRACK_ID, CITY_ID, CASE_ID, CASE_TYPE, TRACK_METHOD, TRACK_TYPE, TRACK_CONTENT, TRACK_WARM, WARM_TIME, WARM_CONTENT, TRACK_USER, TRACK_TIME ) values (#{trackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackMethod,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{trackType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{trackContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackWarm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{warmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{warmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update CASE_TRACK
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACK_METHOD = #{trackMethod,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TRACK_TYPE = #{trackType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TRACK_CONTENT = #{trackContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACK_WARM = #{trackWarm,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WARM_TIME = #{warmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WARM_CONTENT = #{warmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACK_USER = #{trackUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TRACK_TIME = #{trackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TRACK_ID = #{trackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update CASE_TRACK set CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACK_METHOD = #{trackMethod,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TRACK_TYPE = #{trackType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TRACK_CONTENT = #{trackContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACK_WARM = #{trackWarm,jdbcType=TINYINT}, WARM_TIME = #{warmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WARM_CONTENT = #{warmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACK_USER = #{trackUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRACK_TIME = #{trackTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TRACK_ID = #{trackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select MAX(TRACK_ID)+1 as id from CASE_TRACK

select ${regField} as regField, ${sectionField} as sectionField , INFO_SOURCE, REPEAT_FLAG, SOSO_ID, UGC_ID,CLIENT_ID, (SELECT CLIENT_MOBILE FROM WEB_CLIENT WHERE WEB_CLIENT.CITY_ID = ${tableName}.CITY_ID AND WEB_CLIENT.CLIENT_ID = ${tableName}.CLIENT_ID ) as CLIENT_MOBILE from ${tableName} where CITY_ID = #{cityId} and ${fieldName} = #{caseId}
mapper.update: update ${tableName} set TRACK_USER = #{userId}, TRACK_TIME = #{now} where CITY_ID = #{cityId} and ${fieldName} = #{caseId}
